text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Do have anything to say about Ivanka Trump and fancy soap for her kids hand washing ? I can understand why the ice cream bother you and not the waisted soap,!!! Explain your rationale why one and not the other ?? If you are going to criticize do equally https://t.co/omcK0KgbuQ
